SearchDlcs: अपने dlcs के माध्यम से खोजें ..
SearchPackages: अपने पैकेज के माध्यम से खोजें ।।
ModIsUnknown: स्टीम से इस मॉड की जानकारी नहीं मिल सका
ModIsMaybeOutOfDate: मॉड डेट से बाहर हो सकता है
ModIsIncomplete: MOD पूरी तरह से डाउनलोड नहीं किया गया है या फ़ाइलें गुम हैं
ModIsUpToDate: MOD अद्यतित है और पूरी तरह से डाउनलोड किया गया है
ModIncomplete: MOD पूरी तरह से डाउनलोड नहीं किया गया है या फ़ाइलें गुम हैं
ModIncompletePlural: MODs पूरी तरह से डाउनलोड नहीं किए गए हैं या फाइलें गायब हैं
AssetIsRemoved: इस संपत्ति को भाप से हटा दिया गया था
AssetIsUnknown: स्टीम से इस संपत्ति की जानकारी नहीं मिल सका
AssetIsNotDownloaded: यह संपत्ति डाउनलोड नहीं की गई है, यह आपके कंप्यूटर पर मौजूद नहीं है
AssetIsIncomplete: एसेट पूरी तरह से डाउनलोड नहीं है या फाइलें गायब है
AssetIsUpToDate: संपत्ति अद्यतित है और पूरी तरह से डाउनलोड की गई है
PartiallyDownloaded: आंशिक रूप से डाउनलोड किया गया
TemporaryPlaysetCanNotBeEdited: Temporary playset's settings will reset when you re-open the app
IncludesItemsYouDoNotHave: आपके पास ऐसी वस्तुएं शामिल हैं जो आपके पास नहीं हैं
NoLocalPackagesFound: आपके कंप्यूटर पर कोई पैकेज नहीं मिला।
CheckFolderInOptions: यदि गलत फ़ोल्डर का उपयोग किया जा रहा है, तो विकल्प पैनल की जाँच करें।
NoPackagesMatchFilters: कोई भी पैकेज आपकी फ़िल्टर सेटिंग्स से मेल नहीं खाता है
CollectionLink: स्टीम कलेक्शन URL या ID नंबर
PasteCollection: उस संग्रह का URL या ID पेस्ट करें जिसे आप देखना चाहते हैं
ModsShouldUnsub: मॉड्स जो से अनसब्स किया जाना चाहिए
LinkModAssets: मॉड्स से MOD की 'शामिल' स्थिति के लिए संपत्तियों को लिंक करें
StartScratch: स्क्रैच से एक प्रोफ़ाइल शुरू करें
SomePackagesWillBeDisabled: इस प्रोफ़ाइल के उपयोग को बदलकर कुछ पैकेज हटा दिए जाएंगे।
ConfirmDeletePlayset: Are you sure you want to delete the playset '{0}'?
PlaysetReplace: Load the settings of this playset
PlaysetMerge: Merge its items into your current playset
PlaysetExclude: Exclude its items from your current playset
OpenLocalFolder: इस पैकेज वाले स्थानीय फ़ोल्डर खोलें
ViewOnSteam: इस पैकेज को स्टीम पर देखें

ReDownloadPackage.One: इस पैकेज को फिर से लोड करें

CopySteamId: इस स्टीम आईडी को कॉपी करें
VirtualGamePath: आपके लिनक्स/मैक पर रियल "सिटीज़: स्काईलाइन्स स्टीम फ़ोल्डर"
VirtualAppDataPath: रियल "सिटीज़: स्काईलाइन्स ऐप डेटा फ़ोल्डर" आपके लिनक्स/मैक पर
ChangingFoldersRequiresRestart: ऐप द्वारा उपयोग किए गए रास्तों को बदलने के लिए एक पुनरारंभ की आवश्यकता होगी, क्या आप आगे बढ़ना चाहते हैं?
ShowDatesRelatively: वर्तमान समय में अपेक्षाकृत दिनांक दिखाएं
CouldNotCreatePlayset: Could not create a new playset, make sure your folder settings are set up correctly in the options panel
CreatePlaysetHere: Create a new playset or load a previous one by clicking here
DisableNewModsByDefault: डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप से नए सदस्यता वाले मॉड को अक्षम करें
DisableNewAssetsByDefault: डिफ़ॉल्ट रूप से नई सदस्यता प्राप्त परिसंपत्तियों को अक्षम करें
OverrideGameChanges: ओवरराइड में बदलाव किए गए बदलाव मॉड्स की सक्षम स्थिति में हैं
PlaysetSaveInfo: इस स्क्रीन में परिवर्तन स्वचालित रूप से सहेजे जाते हैं, "ऑटोमैटिक सेव" विकल्प और शीर्ष पर सेव बटन आपके चयनित मॉड्स, एसेट्स और डीएलसीएस को प्रभावित करते हैं
PlaysetNameChangedIllegalChars: Some characters were removed from your playset name because they can not be used in a windows file name

CopyWorkshopLink.Plural: Copy the selected packages' Workshop Links

FilterOutPackagesWithOneAsset: पैकेज पेज से सिंगल-एसेट पैकेज छिपाएं

UnsubscribePackage.One: इस पैकेज से सदस्यता समाप्त करें

CopyWorkshopId.Plural: Copy the selected packages' Workshop IDs

PlaysetCreationFailed: Could not create a new playset, make sure your folder settings are set up correctly in the options panel
LaunchThroughCities: शहरों के माध्यम से लॉन्च करें।
NoDlcsNoInternet: DLCs ​​लोड नहीं कर सका, कृपया इंटरनेट से कनेक्ट करें
NoDlcsOpenGame: कोई DLCS आपकी खोज से मेल नहीं खाता है

ExcludeAllItemsInThisPackage.One: Exclude all items in this package
ExcludeAllItemsInThisPackage.Plural: Exclude all of the selected packages

MovePackageToLocalFolder.One: Copy package to a local folder
MovePackageToLocalFolder.Plural: Copy all selected packages to a local folder

HidePseudoMods: थीम मिक्स की तरह छद्म-मोड्स छिपाएं
LaunchTooltip: Click to launch/stop Cities: Skylines or use {0} anywhere in the app
LsmImportMissingInfo: View and subscribe to missing assets
SelectedFileInvalid: The file you selected is not valid
NoItemsToBeDisplayed: No items are to be displayed
FirstSetupInfo: Please enable the Skyve Mod inside Cities: Skylines before using the Skyve App
SkipFileInfo: Select a Skip-file to be used for Loading Screen Mod
SaveFileInfo: Select a save-game file to be automatically loaded when you open the game

CopyAuthorSteamId.Plural: Copy the selected packages' author IDs

DropNewPlayset: Drop or select a playset's .json or .xml file here to import it
LinkModAssets_Tip: Some mods include assets that are required for them to function properly. Enabling this option links those assets to the mod itself and hides those assets from the Assets page so you don't exclude them by mistake.
ShowDatesRelatively_Tip: Changes the format of dates that are displayed in content lists to relative time. For example; Yesterday at 2:10 pm
DisableNewModsByDefault_Tip: When you s`ubscribe or add a mod, the tool will automatically exclude or include it based on this setting when the tool is launched.
DisableNewAssetsByDefault_Tip: When you subscribe or add an asset, the tool will automatically exclude or include it based on this setting when the tool is launched.
FilterOutPackagesWithOneAsset_Tip: Packages that only have a single asset in them will not show on the Packages page. They will still show on the Assets page.
FilterOutPackagesWithMods_Tip: Packages that include a mod will not show on the Packages page. They will still show on the Mods page.
OverrideGameChanges_Tip: Changes made in-game to the enabled status of mods will automatically be overridden by your settings inside of Skyve, changes are applied on the next launch. This only works while the tool is open.
HidePseudoMods_Tip: Theme mixes generate a mod file in order to be shared on the workshop. Enabling this option will hide those from your mods list and have them always included.
AdvancedIncludeEnable_Tip: Enabling this option will let you change both included & enabled states of mods, similar to the original Load Order Tool.
AdvancedLaunchOptions_Tip: Displays extra launch options used by developers in the profile's settings.
ShowFolderSettings_Tip: Shows the folder settings used by the tool in the options page.
HelpTranslate_Tip: Help translate this tool into your native language on Crowdin.
ThemeUIScale_Tip: Change the app's color & theme or increase the scale of the UI.
JoinDiscord_Tip: Ask for help & receive updates about the tool on the Discord server.
OpenGuide_Tip: View the online guide to get started with Skyve.
ResetButton_Tip: Reset your settings to the default ones. This does not affect folder settings.
ResetFolderButton_Tip: This action will require you to launch the game before you can use the tool again.
UseSkipFile: Use a skip-file to exclude vanilla assets
ClearFoldersPrompt: Resetting your folder settings will require you to launch the game before you can open the tool again.
AreYouSure: Are you sure you want to proceed?
MapFileInfo: Select a map file to start a new game with
LoadCollectionTip: Load the collection’s items list and manage which items you want to subscribe to, include, or exclude from this collection.
LsmMissingTip: Drag & drop a LSM report file here or click to select one to subscribe to missing assets listed in the report
LsmUnusedTip: Drag & drop a LSM report file here or click to select one to manage assets you haven't used in your save-game that are listed in the report
FixAllTip: Attempt to re-download all packages that have issues, this will open steam for a brief moment
MultipleLOM: You have multiple versions of Skyve installed or subscribed to, which can cause conflicts. To avoid issues, please remove or unsubscribe from all other versions except for the one you're using
ItemsShouldNotBeSubscribedInfo: You're about to subscribe to packages that might be broken or have other serious issues.
WouldYouLikeToSkipThose: Do you want to skip those packages?
LOTWillRestart: Skyve will temporarily close during the update process, but it will automatically resume once the update is complete.
UpdatingLot: Skyve is currently being updated. Please wait...
SubscribingRequiresGameToOpen: Subscribing or unsubscribing from packages requires opening the game for a brief moment. When you see the game's launcher, click on Play to proceed.
DisableFpsBoosterDebug: You have FPS Booster enabled while using debug mono, would you like to disable it to get better logs?
LogZipCopy_Tip: Create a zip file containing all logging information needed for someone to assist you with your issue, you can paste it directly into a discord channel.
LogZipFile_Tip: Create a zip file containing all logging information needed for someone to assist you with your issue, the folder containing the file will open automatically.
LogFileDrop: Drop or select a log file to be simplified and display the list of errors inside the log
DefaultLogViewInfo: Your last log file's errors will be automatically shown below when opening this page
CopyLogFile: Copy the game's log file to clipboard
CopyLOTLogFile: Copy Skyve's log file to clipboard
ModIncludedEnabledTotal: Mods included: {0}, of which are enabled: {1}, Total: {2}
PackageIncludedEnabledTotal: Packages included: {0}, of which {1} are mods and {2} are enabled, Total: {3}
NewPlayset_Tip: Create or import a new playset
TempPlayset_Tip: Switch to a temporary playset with your current settings
AutoSave_Tip: Automatically save changes to mods & assets to your profile
LoadEnabled_Tip: Loads enabled assets while loading a game. This should be left enabled unless you know what you're doing
LoadUsed_Tip: Load assets that are used in your map, even if they are disabled in-game. This is not related to the asset settings inside Skyve
UseSkipFile_Tip: Use this to exclude vanilla assets from your game
NewGame_Tip: Starts a new game when launching Cities: Skylines. You can specify the map you'd like to start in
LoadSaveGame_Tip: Load a save-game when launching Cities: Skylines. Not selecting a save-file will continue your latest save

ActionUnreversible.One: This action can not be reversed.
ActionUnreversible.Plural: This action can not be reversed. And will affect {0} packages

AlwaysOpenFiltersAndActions: Show the Filters section by default
AlwaysOpenFiltersAndActions_Tip: Always have the filters section open when entering a content tab
XMLImportMissingInfo: View and subscribe to packages in any XML configuration
XMLTip: Select or drag & drop an XML config file to manage the packages listed inside of it.
CheckDocumentsFolder: Make sure Skyve has access to your documents folder, it uses it to store your UI & Language settings.
FailedToSaveLanguage: Failed to save the selected language

IncludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.One: Include this item in all your playsets
IncludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: Include the selected items in all your playsets

ExcludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.One: Exclude this item in all your playsets
ExcludeThisItemInAllPlaysets.Plural: Exclude the selected items in all your playsets

CopyAuthorName.Plural: Copy the selected packages' author names

CopyFolderName.Plural: Copy the selected packages' folder names

PlaysetNameUsed: You already have a playset with the same name. Please change the name of either one of the files to continue.
FailedToImportLegacyPlayset: Failed to convert this legacy playset.
OpenLinksInBrowser: Open Steam links in your browser
OpenLinksInBrowser_Tip: Change Steam links to open in your default browser rather than within the Steam application.
PlaysetStillLoading: Your playset is still loading, please wait before exiting this page.
ApplyPlaysetNameBeforeExit: Please finish editing the playset's name before exiting this page.
OpenSteamToContinue: Please open Steam in order to continue your previous task.
OpenPlaysetFolder: View this playset's file on your computer
SavePlaysetChanges: Save the current package settings to this playset's file
CreateShortcutPlayset: Create a shortcut for it on your desktop
AskToLaunchGameForShortcut: Would you like for the shortcut to also launch the game with your profile?
TextImportMissingInfo: Load a text file containing Steam IDs to easily subscribe to or manage them
XMLImportInfo: You can use files from BOB, Tree Brush, Theme Mix, etc..
LsmImportInfo: Make sure to select the 'Report' file
ResetScrollOnPackageClick: Reset scrolling when opening a package's page
ResetScrollOnPackageClick_Tip: When opening a package's page, resets the scrolling so that the selected package is at the top of the list.
CopyAllIds: Copy all displayed items' Workshop IDs
FlipItemCopyFilterAction: Swap Ctrl+Click behavior for filtering in the content lists
FlipItemCopyFilterAction_Tip: Swaps the default behavior of clicking on labels so that normal clicking filters and Ctrl+Clicking performs the default action.
CleanupInfo: Run a quick cleanup that deletes any package you're not actually subscribed to from your computer as well as forcing the download of missing subscribed packages.
CloseCitiesToClean: You need to close Cities: Skylines to run the cleanup.
CleanupRequiresGameToOpen: The cleanup process requires opening the game for a brief moment. When you see the game's launcher, click on Play to proceed.
DisablePackageCleanup_Tip: Stops the tool from automatically deleting packages you are not subscribed to when opening the game.
LaunchArgsInfo: Add extra arguments when launching the game
SearchWorkshopBrowser: Search the workshop in your browser..
VotingInfo1: The voting icon displayed in the list is split into 3 layers to better represent both small or niche packages, and large & popular packages.
VotingInfo2: The first layer is the vote count, which represents the scale of votes based on how many subscribers the package has.
VotingInfo3: This uses a special formula to try and be as fair as possible to all creators.
VotingInfo4: Negative votes count for {0} compared to positive votes.
VotingInfo5: The second layer is the subscriber count, represented by the golden circle around the icon which scales up to {0} subscribers.
VotingInfo6: The third and final layer is when a package has a high voting score and over {0} subscribers, represented by a golden icon.
AssetsShouldUnsub: assets that should be unsubscribed from
ControlToSelectMultiplePackages: Ctrl + Click to select multiple packages at once.
AdvancedIncludeEnable: Show both of the included and enabled state for mods
Author: Author

ItemsHidden.One: {0} {1} is hidden because of your profile's usage
ItemsHidden.Plural: {0} {1} are hidden because of your profile's usage

ExplainIssueInfo: Include as much information about what is happening and how to replicate it here

ReviewRequestFailed:

ShowAllReferencedPackages: Show excluded packages in the 'References' tab
ShowAllReferencedPackages_Tip: Displays both excluded and included packages that reference the one you're viewing.
TreatOptionalAsRequired_Tip: Essentially, this displays the missing dependency notification for optional packages.

IncompleteCount.Plural: {0} {1} do not match their respective sizes from the Workshop

You are {1} behind

AddMeaningfulDescription: Please add a meaningful description to your request.
RedownloadComplete: Skyve finished re-downloading the packages with issues.
CleanupComplete: Skyve finished cleaning up your Workshop downloads.
ApplySubs: Launch the game for a brief moment to apply pending subscriptions
ApplyDownloads: Force Steam to download all pending packages
SubsPendingInfo:
Packages you subscribe to are grouped here.
Once you open the game, those items will be subscribed to on Steam.
DownloadsPendingInfo: Packages you subscribe to and haven't been downloaded yet are grouped here.
ForceDownloadAndDeleteAsSoonAsRequested: Start the download or removal of packages immediately after subscribing/unsubscribing
ForceDownloadAndDeleteAsSoonAsRequested_: Forces the download or removal of packages instead of waiting till they are actually subscribed or unsubscribed.

ThisSubscribesTo.One: You will be subscribing to {0} package in this process.
ThisSubscribesTo.Plural: You will be subscribing to {0} packages in this process.

ThisUnsubscribesFrom.One: You will be unsubscribing from {0} package in this process.
ThisUnsubscribesFrom.Plural: You will be unsubscribing from {0} packages in this process.

RequestOption2: Add a missing status for the package

ImportFromLink: Import a profile using a profile ID

AssumeInternetConnectivity_Tip: Skips checking for internet and automatically assumes you are connected.
EditingMultipleTags: Editing multiple packages' tags will overwrite each of their custom tags.

EditTagsOfPackage.Plural: Edit all of the selected packages' assets' Tags

TroubleshootInfo: If you have a mod or asset that is causing an issue, or that is missing, and you don't known which one; Try troubleshooting it here:
TroubleshootCaused: A mod or asset I'm using is causing issues
TroubleshootNew: A recent mod update or new subscription is causing issues
TroubleshootMissing: I'm missing a mod or asset, and that is causing issues
TroubleshootSelection: Which option best describes your situation?
TroubleshootModOrAsset: What kind of content would you like to troubleshoot?
WaitingForGameLaunch: Waiting for the game to be launched...
WaitingForGameClose: Waiting for the game to be closed...
UseEnglishPlease: * Please try to use English in your description.
CancelTroubleshootMessage:
Would you like to reset to the configuration you were using before starting the troubleshoot?

Select 'No' to keep the current configuration of packages.
TroubleshootAskIfFixed: Did the last changes fix the issue that you're trying to solve?
TroubleshootAskToStop:
Would you like to stop the troubleshooting here and keep the current configuration of packages?

Select 'No' to continue troubleshooting.
TroubleshootNextStageTip: Skip the current stage. Use it if you've already completed it and want to proceed.
TroubleshootBubbleTip:
This is the troubleshooting menu, it will guide you throughout the process.
You can close Skyve and continue later, it will remember your progress.

TroubleshootCompAsk.One:
You have a package with a serious compatibility warning.
You might want to try dealing with it first before troubleshooting.
TroubleshootCompAsk.Plural:
You have {0} packages with serious compatibility warnings.
You might want to try dealing with them first before troubleshooting.

SkyveDetectedFaultyPackages: Skyve detected that some of your packages are not perfectly downloaded, would you like to try fixing them first?
TroubleshootCauseResult: The following packages might be the cause of your issues
